description.narrative:
IFEX is a global network of more than 100 organisations in over 70 countries around the world, dedicated to defend and promote freedom of expression and information as a fundamental human right.
IFEX has developed a new five-year strategy for the period 2020-2024. The strategy focuses on four thematic areas, each of them with an overall goal: 1) Right to information - The challenges of access to information, its circulation and integrity, are confronted. 2) Civic Space - Civil society enabled and civic space protected as it relates to Freedom of Expression and Information (FoE&I). 3) Safety and Justice - A safer environment for those exercising their right to FoE&I. 4) Network building - Strengthened capacity of the IFEX network to promote and defend the right to FoE&I.

Insatsen avser ett kärnstöd till yttrandefrihetsnätverket IFEX om totalt 60 MSEK under en femårsperiod 2020-2024. För denna period har IFEX utvecklat en strategi, med fokus på fyra tematiska områden:
1) "Right to information" - med målsättningen att addressera de olika utmaningar som finns kring rätten och tillgång till information.
2) "Civic space" - med målsättningen att de som försvarar yttrandefrihet och rätten till information och de utrymmen som finns stärks och skyddas.
3) "Safety and justice" - med målsättningen att skapa en säkrare miljö för de som utövar sin rätt till yttrandefrihet och information.
4) "Network building" - stärkt kapacitet inom IFEX-nätverket att främja och försvara rätten till yttrandefrihet och information.

In its new five-year strategic plan, covering the period 2020-2024, IFEX has identified four key priority areas: 1) Right to information - Goal: The challenges of access to information, its circulation and integrity, are confronted. Objectives: 1. Increased adoption and implementation of robust access to information (ATI) laws and standards by states. 2. Circulation of information online and offline better promoted and defended. 3. Greater action to counter the threats to information integrity online and offline and their impact on Freedom of Expression and Information (FoE&I). 2) Civic Space - Goal: Civil society enabled and civic space protected as it relates to FoE&I. Objectives: 1. Increased network push back against efforts and issues that diminish and/or restrict civic space as it relates to FoE&I. 2. Value of civic space as it relates to FoE&I is acknowledged and reinforced among IFEX's target audience of members, allies, and other engaged individuals and actors. 3) Safety & Justice - Goal: A safer environment for those exercising their right to FoE&I. Objectives: 1. Strengthened normative environment and protection practices for the safety of those exercising their right to FoE&I. 2. Improved justice for those experiencing FoE&I violations. 4) Network building - Goal: Strengthened capacity of the IFEX network to promote and defend the right to FoE&I. Objectives: 1. Enhance member organisational capacity. 2. Enhance meaningful connections between IFEX members. 3. Connections with allies outside the IFEX network are strengthened and diversified.
